General:
- Added EU servers and matchmaking region. EU testing times are Mon-Thur 5PM to 3AM and Fri-Sun 3PM to 3AM. Times listed are Central European Summer Time (GMT+2).
- Removed the invite requirement of Steam friends having been on your list for a number of days (affected normal user cases often where friends weren't on the Steam list, and we have other metrics and tools on the backend now that we can use to filter for other cases)
- Added search functionality to the shop. You can now search by item name or by individual stat such as 'Ammo', 'Lifesteal', or 'Spirit Power'.
- The game will now let you know when it is safe to abandon (usually if one person has been disconnected for a while)
- Your personal builds are now always sorted to the top of the in-game Builds dropdown
- Various network related improvements when there is packet loss
- Preferred heroes in your roster are now remember on the client across sessions
- Fixed chat wheel not working during the post-game sequence
- Updated the entrance to the underground tunnels from the outer lanes to look more like a subway entrance
- Re-enabled ultra wide UI mode
- Added street names and symbols to the Zipline UI
- Updated {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger and {{Icon|Silence Glyph}} Silence Glyph tooltips to clarify that they do not cancel channeling abilities
- Updated reload animations for {{Icon|Warden}} Warden, {{Icon|Dynamo}} Dynamo, and {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy
- Improved visibility of Inferno's {{Icon|Concussive Combustion}} Concussive Combustion
- Fixed the unit target UI not showing up for instant-cast abilities (MoKrill ult, {{Icon|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist ult, {{Icon|Bebop}} Bebop bomb)
- Fixed the unit target UI not showing the activation button hint
- Added a Cosmic Veil to the hero demo map
- Added {{Icon|Ethereal Shift}} Ethereal Shift sounds
- Added wind sound when on the Zipline
Flying Cloak: - Fixed a recent change causing {{Icon|Enchanter's Satchel}} Enchanter's Satchel to not play damage at the destination when teleporting with {{Icon|Flying Cloak}} Flying Cloak
Abilities:
- Updated {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger and {{Icon|Silence Glyph}} Silence Glyph tooltips to clarify that they do not cancel channeling abilities
- Improved visibility of Inferno's {{Icon|Concussive Combustion}} Concussive Combustion
- Improved misc issues with {{Icon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact collision
- {{Icon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact can be held for up to 3 seconds. Press the ability again anytime to land.
- {{Icon|Hook}} Hook hitbox reduced from 36 inches to 33
- {{Icon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam cooldown increased from 100s to 110s
- {{Icon|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora move speed increased from 3.8 to 4.2
- {{Icon|Singularity}} Singularity T1 radius reduced from +3m to +2m
- {{Icon|Singularity}} Singularity falls 70% slower when {{Icon|Majestic Leap}} Majestic Leap down is used (similar to the hero falling slower normally when casting the ability from an elevation)
- Fixed {{Icon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot being evaded by {{Icon|Haze}} Haze's {{Icon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance
- {{Icon|Rain of Arrows}} Rain of Arrows cooldown increased from 30s to 33s
- {{Icon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl can now explode in the air by pressing the release key
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger cooldown reduced from 29s to 27s
- {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger T2 cooldown changed from -15s to -13s
- {{Icon|Smoke Bomb}} Smoke Bomb T2 changed to "Replenishes stamina on cast and grants +40% Stamina Regen"
- {{Icon|Fixation}} Fixation bonus damage no longer ignores bullet falloff
- {{Icon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance cast point reduced from 0.8s to 0.4s
- {{Icon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance move speed increased from 3.5 to 4
- Fixed {{Icon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash duration not being affected by duration extender
- {{Icon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb now does 50% less damage to objectives
- {{Icon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam movespeed limit is now applied via a reduction rather than a speed cap (to allow items to be combined for faster movement like {{Icon|Surge of Power}} Surge of Power)
- {{Icon|Essence Bomb}} Essence Bomb no longer starts decaying the arm time while in the air
- {{Icon|Essence Bomb}} Essence Bomb arm time reduced from 1s to 0.5s (this is a nerf for long distance bombs)
- {{Icon|Soul Exchange}} Soul Exchange T3 changed to "After swap gain +40% Fire Rate and +40% Spirit Resistance for 8s"
- Fixed it being possible to lose your full lock on with {{Icon|Death Slam}} Death Slam sometimes if you look away
- {{Icon|Spectral Wall}} Spectral Wall cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
- {{Icon|Heavy {{Icon|Barrage}} Barrage}} Heavy {{Icon|Barrage}} Barrage cooldown reduced from 110s to 100s
- You can now cast items and {{Icon|Scorn}} Scorn while spinning out of {{Icon|Burrow}} Burrow
- {{Icon|Combo}} Combo bonus health per kill increased from 25 to 30
- {{Icon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine cooldown increased from 22s to 24s
- {{Icon|Paradox}} {{Icon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap cooldown increased from 35s to 45s
- {{Icon|Barrage}} Barrage base damage reduced from 40 to 35
- {{Icon|Barrage}} Barrage T1 reduced from +20 to +15
- Fixed a recent change causing {{Icon|Enchanter's Satchel}} Enchanter's Satchel to not play damage at the destination when teleporting with {{Icon|Flying Cloak}} Flying Cloak
- {{Icon|Static Charge}} Static Charge now uses the new instant cast option that {{Icon|Bebop}} Bebop Bomb uses
- {{Icon|Power Surge}} Power Surge spirit scaling increased from 0.1 to 0.2 (new total with T3 is now from 0.5 to 0.6)
- {{Icon|Crow Familiar}} Crow Familiar debuff duration increased from 5s to 6s
- {{Icon|Assassinate}} Assassinate bonus damage increased from 130 to 145
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation now provides 80% Damage Resistance and 80% Debuff Resistance instead of invulnerability during the post-channel buff
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation cooldown reduced from 110s to 100s
- {{Icon|Shadow Transformation}} Shadow Transformation T3 increased from +1s to +1.5s

- Updated {{Icon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger and {{Icon|Silence Glyph}} Silence Glyph tooltips to clarify that they do not cancel channeling abilities

- Added a new T4 Vitality item, {{Icon|Colossus}} Colossus

Bullet Lifesteal: Passive: Pressing the reload key during the halfway point of a reload will cause you to instantly regain your magazine and grant you +30% {{Icon|Bullet Lifesteal}} Bullet Lifesteal and +15% Fire Rate for 6s. The reload UI has an indicator for the trigger window. Cooldown: 25s
Unstoppable: - Active Spirit Resistance reduced from 40% to 20%
Spirit Lifesteal:
Active: Gain 12 Spirit and 20% {{Icon|Spirit Lifesteal}} Spirit Lifesteal for 6 seconds. Cooldown: 35s
- Bullet and {{Icon|Spirit Lifesteal}} Spirit Lifesteal reduced from 15% to 10%

Hyper Beam: - {{Icon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam cooldown increased from 100s to 110s

Ivy:
- Updated reload animations for {{Icon|Warden}} Warden, {{Icon|Dynamo}} Dynamo, and {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy

Warden: - Updated reload animations for {{Icon|Warden}} Warden, {{Icon|Dynamo}} Dynamo, and {{Icon|Ivy}} Ivy
Misc:
- Rejuv buff is now only granted to the players that are alive. Players that are dead will have their respawn times cut in half from their current values.
- Footsteps are now quieter when obstructed by level geometry
- Dash-Down is now double tap CTRL instead of CTRL+SHIFT
- Vault bounty increased from 300 to 330
- Fixed various bugs with {{Icon|Headshot Booster}} Headshot Booster and {{Icon|Sharpshooter}} Sharpshooter
- Added another entrance/exit to the underground tunnels from the warehouse interiors
- Enclosed the exterior Medium Neutral Camp with fencing in front of the Theater to match the Amber side Cab Stand
- Added two more veils on each side:
1) Between the Drug Store and the Market on Amber, between the Hotel and Pharmacy on Sapphire
2) Between the exterior Strong Neutral Camps and the outer lane near the T2

- Cooldown increased from 20s to 26s
